name: Air Force Gear
description:
Choose between three difficulty levels: Easy, normal and difficult.
By completing these levels you can unlock two extra levels.

The control is simple:

Touch an option to select. Touch again to select that option.
Move the plane by pressing and dragging your finger from right to left.
Tap the plane quickly to fire the artillery.

The game has buttons to pause the game, remove the music or return to the start menu. You don't have time to play?

This minigame is ideal for you! If you are a fan of this type of games, you will love Air Force Gear.

You can play the game as many times as you want by resetting the rankings
